steps.name: User selects language "Italian (Italiano)"
Go to homepage
verify user screen
Click style tab and get the listed season name in the style tab
User create New season with mandatory deatails for season creation "autumn1","100","new model"
Click New Brand
Create Brand by providing valid and mandatory data "brand","101","otto"
Save the New Brand which was created
Click New department by providing valid data  "dept","ot01","shirts"
Save the New department which was created
Click New collection
Create collection by providing valida and mandatory details "collection","Cot001","cotton"
Save the collection which was created
Click New style
Create Style followed by its style Type "Apparel"
Go to homepage
select the image from the avilable resource
Verify the created season, Brand, Department, Collection and Style which was created.
Logout from the Application
